title: Information on univers
content:
I am very interested in learning everything there is to know about the typeface Univers—the original typeface which was created by Adrian Frutiger. I would appreciate any help for great resources on the topic.

Thanks!
author: ERO

comments.content: A [start](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020045917/http:/typophile.com/node/13516). And [another one](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020045917/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Univers). The [famous matrix graphic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020045917/http:/www.100besteschriften.de/10_Univers.html), illustrating the numbering system.
And the best text on the history of Univers is a chapter in [this book](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020045917/http:/www.amazon.com/Printers-Type-Twentieth-Century-Manufacturing/dp/1584561556/).
